meanings.sent1: The two circles were nonoverlapping, so they did not touch at any point.
meanings.sent2: The nonoverlapping puzzle pieces fit together perfectly without any overlap.
meanings.sent3: The nonoverlapping traffic lights confused the drivers, making them stop at the wrong times.
meanings.sent4: Her nonoverlapping schedules for work and school made it challenging to find time for herself.
meanings.sent5: The nonoverlapping shadows of the trees created a beautiful pattern on the ground.

meanings.definition: Not sharing any common elements or characteristics
meanings.sent1: The two groups had nonoverlapping interests, so they rarely interacted.
meanings.sent2: In the Venn diagram, the circles representing the sets were clearly nonoverlapping.
meanings.sent3: The nonoverlapping flavors of the ice cream left her wanting to try a different combination.
meanings.sent4: Their nonoverlapping opinions on the matter led to a heated debate.
meanings.sent5: The nonoverlapping patterns on the fabric created a unique and eye-catching design.
